item.title: New SpongeBob SquarePants game by THQ Nordic coming in 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/new-spongebob-squarepants-game-by-thq-nordic-coming-in-2025

"An all-new adventure awaits."

A new SpongeBob SquarePants game by THQ Nordic is planned for release in 2025, the company teased.

The new game was teased in a “SpongeBob SquarePants Halloween Gaming” trailer released by the company today, which highlights SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom – Rehydrated and SpongeBob SquarePants: The Cosmic Shake.

The end of the trailer contains a series of cards that read, “SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom – Rehydrated… SpongeBob SquarePants: The Cosmic Shake… and… an all-new adventure awaits [in] 2025.” The small teaser for the next game shows silhouettes of SpongeBob and Patrick turning into ghosts.

Watch the video below.

SpongeBob SquarePants Halloween Gaming Trailer
